Whiskquilibrium The Game

16 Oct 2018

On 29th and 30th September, I had the chance to participate in the Megathon Hackathon at IIIT Hyderabad.
Hackathons I felt are a bit of a strange thing, the novelty of cooking something up in a day or two versus the knowledge that most of what will be churned out in such events will be empty air in mere hours.
Still, it’s a good thing to try out if you’re in a coding slump.

with a team consisting of me, Kushal Agarwal, Arnav Dhamija and Nischay Ram (and a team appropriately called )

We devised and developed Whiskquilibrium , a 2D platformer game. It involves a cat named “Minto” trapped in a quantum world. She has the ability to shift her state between being alive and a ghostly dead form. Her prescence itself changes the nature of the world around her. Can you solve the obstacles in her path that prevent her from escaping the mad world she is in? Goal - To be developed enough to be released on Steam
